<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><component><breadcrumbs><ancestor><id>uva-lib:2214294</id><title>WSLS-TV (Roanoke, VA) News Film Collection, 1951 to 1971</title></ancestor><ancestor><id>uva-lib:2220354</id><title>1951</title></ancestor><ancestor><id>uva-lib:2220353</id><title>April</title></ancestor></breadcrumbs><id>uva-lib:2220355</id><type>item</type><unittitle>Man injured in shooting in Roanoke, Va.</unittitle><shortunittitle>Man injured in shooting in Roanoke, Va.</shortunittitle></component>
Man injured in shooting in Roanoke, Va.
Man injured in shooting in Roanoke, Va.
Man injured in shooting in Roanoke, Va.
Man injured in shooting in Roanoke, Va.

Roanoke, Va., police officers escort a former convict out of a police car and into the Roanoke, Va., police department after arresting him for shooting another man. Several men carry the shooting victim from the house in which he was shot, place him on a stretcher, and load the stretcher into an ambulance.

Roanoke, Va., police officers escort a former convict out of a police car and into the Roanoke, Va., police department after arresting him for shooting another man. Several men carry the shooting victim from the house in which he was shot, place him on a stretcher, and load the stretcher into an ambulance.

6271 (ROLL FILM) A Roanoke negroe stands charged with felonious wounding in a shooting today. (TAKE FILM) 35-year-old Booker T. King, a former convict who gave his address as the Roanoke City Jail, was arrested by officers after he fled the scene in a cab. King, according to police, was recently released from Bland County Correctional Farm where he was serving time for another shooting. The wounded man is 27-year-old John Tyree of 1114 Dunbar Avenue, Northwest. The shooting occured at 107 Loudon Avenue, Northwest. Tyree is shot in the right side. King is also charged on another warrant with threatening to kill. That warrent was sworn out prior to todays shooting. (LIVE ON)

King, according to police, was recently released from Bland County Correctional Farm where he was serving time for another shooting. The wounded man is 27-year-old John Tyree of 1114 Dunbar Avenue, Northwest. The shooting occured at 107 Loudon Avenue, Northwest. Tyree is shot in the right side. King is also charged on another warrant with threatening to kill. That warrent was sworn out prior to todays shooting. (LIVE ON)
